name: Roll20 Big Map Tab
description: This makes the map selection tab move down to occupy your whole screen, rather than a single line. This makes it easier to select what map you want to use, roll20 doesn't really like the multiple lines when moving things around though.
additional_info:
Credits to Wandler in the Roll20 Forums.
https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/1818695/fullscreen-page-bar#post-1818695
